title: Wall Street Breakfast May 5: The Fed is Still Hawkish, but Powell Dialed Down the Fear Factor
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The Federal Reserve is still Hawkish but Powell dialed down the fear factor. Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway buys another 5.9M Occidental shares. OPEC+ meets with small supply boost still expected. Catch today’s WSB article here.
